**Special Containment Procedures:** Disinformation campaigns are currently ongoing to obscure the existence of SCP-MORE GUN from the general public. Foundation webcrawlers have been programmed to target publications and social media posts that might constitute events derived from SCP-MORE GUN.

**Description:** SCP-MORE GUN refers to an anomalous correlation between the magnitude of excessive and gratuitous firepower and the effectiveness of any action said firepower is applied to. While poorly understood for the most part, it is known that the presence of the following factors may lead to the occurrence of SCP-MORE GUN.
* An excessive amount of firearms[[footnote]] Defined as anything that shoots things really quickly. [[/footnote]] [[footnote]] Inclusive of a potato jammed into a vehicular exhaust pipe. [[/footnote]]
* An excessive variety of firearms [[footnote]] Ideally, no two firearms should be of identical make, but this appears to be overridden by increments in total number of firearms used. [[/footnote]]
* Customization[[footnote]] All customization requests must now be authorized by the Department of Task Forces following the ruling of //SCP Foundation v. Valve Corp.// [[/footnote]] of firearms present

SCP-MORE GUN was first discovered during an incident involving D-Class and armed MTF personnel, an experimental adiabatic bomb, several rolls of toilet paper, a leaf blower, and a breached SCP-████-J. Following amendments to SCP-████-J's containment procedures and several other unrelated incidents of similar nature, the Department of Other formally opened investigations into the anomaly to investigate the extent of its effects and to further understand its initiation process.

[[div class="darkdocument"]]
= __**ADDENDUM MORE GUN.1:**__ Investigation by the Department of Other 
----
The initial phase of testing primarily focused on the initiation of SCP-MORE GUN for security and containment purposes. However, due to activities of such nature already requiring the use of a significant degree of firepower, SCP-MORE GUN occurrences were a rarity. Presently, SCP-MORE GUN is believed to be a fundamental property of firepower, exhibiting similarities to the Dunning-Kruger effect which are explored in the Moore-Gunn model. 


[[include component:image-block name=graph.png|width=100%|caption=SCP-MORE GUN explained via the Moore-Gunn model.]]

Under the Moore-Gunn model, it is assumed that all actions may be accomplished via the application of firepower, but there exists a certain boundary in the magnitude of firepower that will lead to a successful action. Failure to apply an appropriate amount of firepower for a given action will lead to its failure and potentially undesirable consequences, which is particularly apparent for excessive firepower application. 

However, should one greatly upscale the magnitude of firepower, SCP-MORE GUN is initiated, resulting in an unintended outcome many times more expedient or desirable than the original action. 


 
@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
= __**ADDENDUM MORE GUN.1.1:**__ Testing Log Excerpts
----


[[div class="blockquote"]]
**TARGET ACTION:** Preparation of a bowl of macaroni and cheese.

**ACTION TAKEN:** Constituent ingredients acquired from Site-19 pantry and placed on a wooden stool in testing area. 135 security and MTF personnel wielding a variety of firearms, ranging from handguns to grenade launchers, were instructed to fire at the wooden stool continuously for 10 minutes on a rotatory basis to compensate for reloading intervals. Experimental directed-energy weapons were temporarily requisitioned from Site-19's labs to provide additional firepower. [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-big-egg-j SCP-Big egg] was also egged in for good measure.

**RESULTS:** ##lime|**SUCCESS.**## Upon the settling of the dust, 1 bowl of macaroni and cheese, paired with a fluffy omelet,[[footnote]] SCP-Big egg egged back to normal Big within the next 20 minutes. [[/footnote]] sweet buttery lobster chunks, and exuding the unmistakable aroma of truffle oil,[[footnote]] It is unclear where either lobster and truffle oil came from. Site-19 spends way too little of their budget on stocking their pantry //properly//. [[/footnote]] so freshly cooked and inviting that 24 personnel tripped over each other and SCP-Big egg to steal away a bite, some of them crying tears of euphoria upon consuming this earthly ambrosia. Wooden stool obliterated.
[[/div]]

----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**TARGET ACTION:** Derivation of the specific equation(s) that SCP-MORE GUN obeys.

**ACTION TAKEN:** A stockpile of arithmetic instruments and mathematics materials was assembled, included 58 graphing calculators, 4 graduate mathematics textbooks, and a computer hosting a copy of T-32MO.aic[[footnote]] Class-II Narrow Intelligence AI widely used for advanced calculation and general data analysis. [[/footnote]] and hundreds of other textbooks in PDF format. Test site continuously bombed via 20 B-52 Stratofortresses, 5 of which utilized napalm. 300 MTF personnel discharged assorted firearms in the direction of the build site, accompanied by 10 mounted directed-energy turrets. Operation supported by gunfire from SCPS Lagrange and SCPS Repulse.

**RESULTS:** ##red|**FAILURE.**## Computer managed to survive bombardment. T-32MO.aic copy spontaneously achieved Class-V functionality and Superintelligence, later reclassified as T-33MO.aic, but was unable to provide any mathematical explanation for SCP-MORE GUN. T-33MO.aic remains under quarantine at Dr. Chekov's workstation, as it has displayed hostility towards other research personnel.[[footnote]] Class-V AI aren't supposed to be this pissy about being blown up. It's not like they have feelings. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]

----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**TARGET ACTION:** Containment of [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/cimmerian-kaktus-proposal SCP-001-J].[[footnote]] Omniscient, omnipotent, and omnitemporal entity named Michael Kain, worshipped as "The Broke God". Terrible with finances. [[/footnote]]

**ACTION TAKEN:** SCP-001-J was located in a 1990 Toyota Corolla in Low Earth orbit, presumably evading creditors. [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-666-j Dr. Gerald] was instructed to pursue SCP-001-J from a modified 2019 Nissan Sentra, which was launched into flight via the Site-19 railgun. In addition to the 15 sentry turrets mounted to the roof and doors of the Nissan Sentra and 30 homing missiles locked on to SCP-001-J, Dr. Gerald's anomalous driving abilities were believed to be sufficient in initiating SCP-MORE GUN.

[[include component:image-block name=brokegod.png|width=100%|caption=SCP-001-J evading Dr. Gerald in a 1990 Toyota Corolla.]]

**RESULTS:** ##lime|**SUCCESS.**## SCP-001-J currently contained at Site-19 in a "Gleipnir"[[footnote]] Anti-omniscient, anti-omnipotent, //and// anti-omnitemporal. I have no idea why we didn't start with this in the first place.[[/footnote]] thaumaturgic binding matrix. The Toyota Corolla has since been repossessed. Dr. Gerald returned to Site-19 without issue, but has unfortunately retained his vehohazardous[[footnote]] Like a cognitohazard, but for anything that has a steering wheel with Gerald behind it. [[/footnote]] properties. Unintentional loss of the only Tunisian satellite.
[[/div]]

----


[[/div]]
[[/div]]

= __**ADDENDUM MORE GUN.2:**__ Concerning SCP-MORE GUN Related Developments
----
[[table class="wiki-content-table"]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
«BEGIN TRANSCRIPT»
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="font-weight: normal; text-align: left;"]]
//Drs. Chekov, Moore, and Gunn review SCP-MORE GUN testing logs for the day. Dr. Moore begins squinting at her screen.//

**MOORE:** Err... Anthony, did you encrypt any of the testing logs?

**CHEKOV:** No, I... what? 

**MOORE:** Hmm. There's another one here. You getting anything for Log ID 4FT0-MG, Peter?

**GUNN:** Nope. It's encrypted too, and... it's now prompting me for some password. "Does the Black Moon howl?" That's some O5 shtick, isn't it?

**MOORE:** Huh. Did we ever forward SCP-MORE GUN's data to the O5 Council?

**CHEKOV:** Absolutely not. I haven't even finalized the report yet.

**MOORE:** Then what were you doing in the data center yesterday at 3 in the morning?

**CHEKOV:** I was doing... stuff... work stuff.

**T33-MO.aic:** And I'm stuff!

**CHEKOV:** Oh fuck. No no no--

//Dr. Chekov attempts to shut down his computer, to no avail. T33-MO.aic laughs at Dr. Chekov's maidenless behavior while Drs. Moore and Gunn watch on, well aware of Dr. Chekov's "preferences" ever since that smart toaster incident.//

**T33-MO.aic:** Here, let me help you folks out.

//T33-MO.aic inputs "YES" in the terminal. The password is accepted.//

**T33-MO.aic:** Now we're even, my darling Tony ;)

//Multiple SCP-MORE GUN test logs flash onto Dr. Chekov's screen. Drs. Moore and Gunn move to inspect them as a [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6996 SCP-6996] saturated Dr. Chekov groans into a nearby neck pillow.//
[[/div]]
[[div class="blockquote" style="font-weight: normal; text-align: left;"]]
----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**TARGET ACTION:** Termination of SCP-173.

**ACTION TAKEN:** SCP-173 is moved to testing site and enclosed in a 150 meter radius monodirectional confinement sigil.[[footnote]] Temporarily permits the entry of "out" to "in", but not conversely. [[/footnote]] Tactical nuclear device applied in tandem with machine gun strafing runs from 5 UH-60 Black Hawks and operation of 30 M777 artillery pieces. 300 additional MTF personnel discharged assorted firearms into the subsequent blast.

[[include component:image-block name=blast.jpg|width=100%|caption=SCP-MORE GUN testing in progress.]]

**RESULTS:** ##red|**FAILURE.**## SCP-173 remained completely intact and was recontained without issue. Foundation personnel embedded in seismological institutions successfully obfuscated the detonation of a nuclear device at the testing site, altering data to suggest that the detonation site was actually in North Korea. The unintentional willingness of the North Korean regime to declare responsibility for this designation has assisted in obfuscation efforts. Additionally, SCP-173 has not produced any excretions in over a month. This is believed to be an effect of SCP-MORE GUN, however further tests involving the termination of anomalies have been postponed indefinitely.
[[/div]]

----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**TARGET ACTION:** Acceleration of the European Union's legislative procedure to introduce amendments favorable to Foundation Sites, personnel, and assets within EU member states. [[footnote]] Despite the introduction of agents into the organization's institutions, attempts to lobby for Foundation immunity to certain regulations have remained gridlocked for years. [[/footnote]]

**ACTION TAKEN:** 80 hypersonic "Kestrel" nuclear stealth cruise missiles launched from various outposts in the Arctic Circle, and 1 reinforced tungsten payload launched from CROM-D[[footnote]] Carter-Rasmussen Orbital Mass-Driver. [[/footnote]] targeting Brussels. 13-columned "Aftakarok" meteorological thaumaturgic manifold encompassing the Brussels Metropolitan Area. Cruise missiles were coated with Class-IV[[footnote]] Non-lethal, highly excruciating. [[/footnote]] cognitohazards via drones. Antimemetic sigils applied to tungsten payload. Noospheric concept of "projectiles" temporarily nudged towards "Belgium" .

**RESULTS:** ##lime|**SUCCESS.**## All physical projectiles spontaneously demanifested over Belgian airspace. Heavy rains over Western Europe for the subsequent 13 weeks. Foundation Sites, personnel, and assets within the European Union currently exempt from Regulations No 05/2007,[[footnote]] Abnormal Activities Information Act. [[/footnote]] 11/2013,[[footnote]] Veiled Assets Declaration Act. [[/footnote]] and 02/2020.[[footnote]] Parahuman Civil Rights Act. [[/footnote]] Operation somehow went entirely unnoticed by other Groups of Interest.
[[/div]]
----
[[/div]]
[[div class="blockquote" style="font-weight: normal; text-align: left;"]]
**GUNN:** So //that's// where 173 went!

**MOORE:** Sorry, did I read this correctly? The Council launched 80 nukes towards Belgium?

**CHEKOV:** //[Muffled.]// Hah! The godless Belgians had it coming. 

//Dr. Chekov looks up from his moping session to stare at Dr. Moore and Dr. Gunn.//

**CHEKOV:** Oh, you were being serious? Jesus Christ.

**GUNN:** Y'know, this doesn't seem //that// unreasonable a response to the second most byzantine bureaucracy in the world. If the O5 has bigger guns, what's so wrong with letting them use it to solve bigger problems?

**MOORE:** What part of "the O5 nuked Belgium" is not getting through to you? 

**GUNN:** Obviously that's a major concern, yes, but what if uh... Hmm... Okay, I'm beginning to see why you're both so pissy about this.

**CHEKOV:** Holy hell, they've got plans in here to shoot the Sun... noospheric concepts... baseline reality... uhh... what's an [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/sandrewswann-s-proposal Author]?

**MOORE:** Alright, this has got to stop before they undershoot and break something in the laws of physics or the human psyche. 

**GUNN:** And how would we, personnel of the Department of Other, the joke Department of the Foundation, change the minds of the most powerful people on the planet? 

**CHEKOV:** We send them a //strongly worded// letter.

[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell]]
«END TRANSCRIPT»
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell]]
**AFTERWORD:** A lengthy request for the indefinite postponement of future SCP-MORE GUN test was drafted and submitted for consideration by the O5 Council, outlining potential risks associated with the scope of their current tests, as well as the admonition of the Council for interfering in SCP-MORE GUN documentation without prior notification of the Department of Other.

[[div class="blockquote"]]
= __**ADDENDUM MORE GUN.2.1:**__ Desperate Measures
----
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**TARGET ACTION:** Suppress the O5 Council.

**ACTION TAKEN:** All assets available to the Department of Other utilized, including, but not limited to; tens of thousands of assorted firearms, several thousand missiles,[[footnote]] You would not believe how many missiles are required in some of the -J containment procedures. [[/footnote]] both nuclear and conventional, [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1543-j SCP-1543-02],[[footnote]] Large spacecraft designed to shoot things into the Sun. [[/footnote]] [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-029-j SCP-029-J-4],[[footnote]] To quote Matthews 30:04:2017, "Jesus' fucking voltron angel car". [[/footnote]] [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-cn-2000-j SCP-CN-2000-J-5],[[footnote]] I'm not typing all of that down. [[/footnote]] and an [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2041-j SCP-2041-J][[footnote]] Tank catapult, but really it works with any kind of vehicle. [[/footnote]] operated by Dr. Gerald.

**RESULTS:** ##lime|**SUCCESS.**## All O5 Council members spontaneously generated a moral compass and basic respect for the sanctity of human life. The Council has agreed to indefinitely postpone SCP-MORE GUN tests following a unanimous vote, among other motions and reforms, which also include the formation of an Ethics Committee[[footnote]] We'll see how long this one lasts. [[/footnote]] to oversee and hold the O5 Council accountable for their more ethically ambiguous operations.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
